sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Short-Term, Limited-Duration Health Insurance Coverage Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Short-Term, Limited-Duration Health Insurance Coverage Act.

sections.heading: The Illinois Insurance Code is amended by repealing Sections 123C-4 and 460.
sections.text: The Illinois Insurance Code is amended by repealing Sections 123C-4 and 460.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that the provisions changing Sections 456, 457, and 458 of the Illinois Insurance Code and the provisions repealing Section 460 of the Illinois Insurance Code take effect February 1, 2019
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that the provisions changing Sections 456, 457, and 458 of the Illinois Insurance Code and the provisions repealing Section 460 of the Illinois Insurance Code take effect February 1, 2019.
